name: constructionally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to building things, or to the type of structure, materials, etc. that something has: Although the house was fifty years old it was still constructionally sound. The two staircases are constructionally very similar.
More examplesFewer examplesThe roof is both aesthetically pleasing and constructionally sound.Apart from a few minor problems, the machine was constructionally sound.Roman architects used the arch both constructionally and decoratively.Besides being beautiful to look at, the building is also constructionally unusual in its combination of steel and stone.
